sentences.cn: …柴可夫斯基的《第一钢琴协奏曲》。

sentences.en: a concerto for flute and harp
Concerto Grosso in G minor , Op . 6, No.8, Christmas Concerto.
sentences.cn: 小调大协奏曲, 作品6——第八“圣诞协奏曲”

sentences.en: I enjoyed it very much too. I especially liked the piano concerto.
sentences.cn: 我也很喜欢这次演出, 尤其是那首钢琴协奏曲.

sentences.en: If Tail Concerto gets a sequel, I would be excited.
sentences.cn: 如果TailConcerto能出续集的话, 卡库尔会很向往吧.

sentences.en: It is the oldest concerto in China, with the harmonious tune.
sentences.cn: 它堪称我国最古老的“协奏曲”了, 八音和谐.

sentences.en: The concert ended with a Mozart violin concerto.
sentences.cn: 音乐会在莫扎特的小提琴协奏曲中结束。

sentences.en: The concerto coordination code is used as the object code of scripting language compiler.
sentences.cn: 在运行方面,提出Concerto协调代码作为脚本语言编译器的目标代码.

sentences.en: The pianist's execution of the concerto was marvellous.
sentences.cn: 那钢琴师弹的协奏曲神乎其技.

sentences.en: The piano concerto was well rendered.
sentences.cn: 钢琴协奏曲演奏得很好.

sentences.en: The piano concerto was wonderfully rendered.
sentences.cn: 这首钢琴协奏曲演奏得很好.

sentences.en: The soloist in the violin concerto was Menuhin.
sentences.cn: 这首小提琴协奏曲的独奏者是梅纽因.

sentences.en: The young man gave a masterly performance of the violin concerto.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻人作了一次出色的小提琴协奏曲的表演.

sentences.en: They are performing his play / piano concerto tonight.
sentences.cn: 他们今晚演出他的剧[钢琴协奏曲].

sentences.en: Tschaikovsky's violin concerto is as much a request item as Beethoven's.
sentences.cn: 柴可夫斯基的小提琴协奏曲刊贝多芬的小提琴协奏曲同样是受欢迎的节目.

sentences.en: We listen this final one section of concerto now.
sentences.cn: 现在我们来听这个协奏曲的最后一段.

trans.tran_en: a piece of  classical  music, usually for one instrument and an  orchestra
